Package com.group7.krisefikser.service

Class HouseholdInvitationService

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.service.HouseholdInvitationService
@Service public class HouseholdInvitationService extends Object
Service class for managing household invitations. Handles the creation and acceptance of invitations.

    • HouseholdInvitationService

      public HouseholdInvitationService()

  • Method Details

    • createInvitation

      public HouseholdInvitation createInvitation(Long userId, String email)
      Creates a new household invitation and sends an email to the invitee.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user sending the invitation.
      email - The email address of the invitee.
      Returns:
      The created HouseholdInvitation object.

    • acceptInvitation

      public Long acceptInvitation(String token, Long userId) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      Accepts a household invitation using a token and adds the user to the household.
      Parameters:
      token - The unique token associated with the invitation.
      userId - The ID of the user accepting the invitation.
      Returns:
      The ID of the household the user was added to.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the invitation is not found or has expired.
      JwtMissingPropertyException

    • verifyInvitation

      public HouseholdInvitation verifyInvitation(String token)
      Verifies a household invitation using a token.
      Parameters:
      token - The unique token associated with the invitation.
      Returns:
      The HouseholdInvitation object if found and valid.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the invitation is not found or has expired.
